metadata.title: CVE-2022-27943 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: libiberty/rust-demangle.c in GNU GCC 11.2 allows stack consumption indemangle_const, as demonstrated by nm-new.

criterions.comment: gcc-4.4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
